nodes.text: Gork was a Gamorrean male pirate who served as a member of Kragan Gorr's pirate gang during the First Order/Resistance War.

Gork first appeared in the 2019 episode "No Escape: Part 2" of the animated series Star Wars Resistance. He is voiced by Jonathan Lipow. He was first identified as Gork in the credits of "A Quick Salvage Run."

An earlier version of the episode "The Engineer" had Kazuda Xiono running into Gork while investigating the pirate power siphoning, leading Synara San to come to Xiono's rescue by punching Gork out cold.
